name: Pirates on Target
description:
Move the blocks.


Change the trajectory.


Discover new ways.


Rotate.


And more...

Move the blocks strategically, your objective is to change the trajectory of the cannonballs until they reach the pirate ship. Simple yet challenging.

  • Simple Controls
  • Dozens of levels
  • Original levels
  • Gradual increase in difficulty
  • Variety of obstacles and blocks
